author: gmazza
msg: 1.) CommandLineStarter removed, its functionality placed directly into Fop.main().
Fop.main() now responsible for taking command-line input as provided from
CommandLineOptions, and activating a Driver instance with that data.
2.) Minor cleanup of error messages in CommandLineOptions.

author: gmazza
msg: 1. FOPTaskStarter separated from Starter class (was not using latter's InputHandler).
2. CommandLineStarter made a top-level class, and abstract Starter class removed.
(only one starter being used for command line, regardless of renderer.)

author: gmazza
msg: Renamed apps.FOInputHandler to apps.FOFileHandler to reduce confusion with the new FOInputHandler in the fo package.

author: vmote
msg: move the "common" property classes from layout to fo.properties, renaming them with a "Common" prefix
